alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Inland Dixie; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 11:33AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lafayette and Dixie Counties through 1215 PM EDT... At 1133 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Bell to near Cross City to 15 miles west of Horseshoe Point. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cross City, Horseshoe Point, Horseshoe Beach, Shamrock, Cross City Airport, Old Town, Hatch Bend, Eugene, Fletcher, Guaranto Springs, Fletcher Springs and Fanning Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
